itunes:title: JUL 12, 2022 - THE REGIME ORDERS STEVE BANNON TO STAND TRIAL FOR DEFYING J6 COMMITTEE
title: JUL 12, 2022 - THE REGIME ORDERS STEVE BANNON TO STAND TRIAL FOR DEFYING J6 COMMITTEE
description:
After claiming executive privilege and refusing to testify in front of Pelosi’s January 6th show committee, a judge has ordered Steve Bannon’s trial to commence in DC on Monday, July 17th. Happy Slurpee Day wasn’t so happy in California due to multiple robberies and fatal shooting sprees on 7/11 at six 7-Eleven stores. Chinese citizens were beaten by state police amidst protests at the Henan bank when citizens’ assets were frozen and became inaccessible. President Biden-cited story about a ten-year-old girl who had to cross state lines from Ohio to Indiana in order to get an abortion is called into question after the Attorney General states that there are no cases of child rape that match Biden’s unsubstantiated statement.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

content:encoded:
After claiming executive privilege and refusing to testify in front of Pelosi’s January 6th show committee, a judge has ordered Steve Bannon’s trial to commence in DC on Monday, July 17th. Happy Slurpee Day wasn’t so happy in California due to multiple robberies and fatal shooting sprees on 7/11 at six 7-Eleven stores. Chinese citizens were beaten by state police amidst protests at the Henan bank when citizens’ assets were frozen and became inaccessible. President Biden-cited story about a ten-year-old girl who had to cross state lines from Ohio to Indiana in order to get an abortion is called into question after the Attorney General states that there are no cases of child rape that match Biden’s unsubstantiated statement.
